Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Kedzie. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at LaSalle
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at LaSalle due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at LaSalle due to a door problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
